title: Introducing: Slaughter Beach
content:
Whilst Blaue Blume are currently leading the way for Danish indie music, brand new trio Slaughter Beach are hot on their heels.

Consisting of Nikolaj Westi, Hasse Mydtskov and Mads Emil Aagaard, they channel the spirit of 70’s rock band Big Star, mixed with a slightly grungier, early 90’s vibe, more commonly associated with the likes of Grandaddy and more recently, Modest Mouse. Their newest track, Spinning Globe, is a gorgeously composed waltz whereas debut cut Made-Up True Love is a hook heavy stomper of a first outing. Check out both tracks below, and keep up with the trio on Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
